data.name: XEngine
desc: makes it possible to control a scripting engine.

methods.name: addEngineListener
desc: It is suggested to allow multiple registration of the same listener, thus for each time a listener is added, it has to be removed.

methods.name: cancel
desc: terminates the execution of the running script.
The waiting queue is cleared too.

methods.name: compile
desc: compiles a script module in the scope of the root object.

methods.name: getRoot
desc: gets an interface to the object which is the scripting root.

methods.name: removeEngineListener
desc: It is suggested to allow multiple registration of the same listener, thus for each time a listener is added, it has to be removed.

methods.name: run
desc: runs a script specified by a string.
The arguments given in aArgs can be ignored by the engine. The Script is executed synchronously.

methods.name: runAsync
desc: runs the script specified by a string and makes callbacks.
The arguments given in aArgs can be ignored by the engine. The script is executed asynchronously.

methods.name: setLibraryAccess
desc: sets an access object to get external functions.

methods.name: setRoot
desc: sets an interface to an object as a scripting root.
If the root object implements the XInvocation interface, then the engine uses this interface to set/get properties and call methods.
